wikipedia_page.main: Stefan James Wilson (born 20 September 1989 in Sheffield, UK) is a British racing driver. He is the younger brother of the late Formula One and IndyCar Series driver Justin Wilson.  He is also the winner of the 2007 McLaren Autosport BRDC Award for promising young British drivers.
